en: Bella! Guess who just asked me to prom.
ru: Бэлла! Угадай кто пригласил меня на бал.

en: Who?
Yeah, I actually totally thought that Mike was gonna ask you.
ru: Я была полностью уверена, что Майк собирался пригласить тебя.

en: It's not gonna be weird, though, right? - No. Zero weirdness.
ru: - Хм, не слишком ли это необычно? - Нет. Ни капельки.

en: You guys are great together. - I know, right?
ru: - Вы хорошо смотритесь вместе. - Я знаю. Правда?

en: Tyler... - Gross.
Bella, look. It's a worm.
It's a worm.
Bella, we shouldn't be friends.
ru: Бэлла, мы не можем стать друзьями.

en: You really should've figured that out a little earlier.
ru: Нужно было раньше об этом думать.

en: I mean, why didn't you just let the van crush me
ru: Я думаю, что если бы фургон меня сбил

en: and save yourself all this regret?
ru: ты бы ни о чём сейчас не жалел?

en: What, you think I regret saving you?
ru: Что, думаешь я жалею, что спас тебя?

en: I can see that you do. I just... I don't know why.
ru: Это очевидно. Я просто… Не знаю почему.

en: You don't know anything.
Hi.
Are you gonna be riding with us?
No, our bus is full.
Your mom called. Again.
Well, that's your fault.
You shouldn't have told her about the "almost" accident. You finished?
ru: Зря рассказал маме про аварию. Ты закончил?

en: Yeah. Yeah, I suppose you're right. She always did know how to worry.
ru: Наверное ты права. Она всегда делает из мухи слона.

en: She seems different.
She seems happy.
Phil sounds like an all right guy.
Yeah, he is.
All right.
No, you need the mitts. You need them.
ru: Нет, вам нужны перчатки. Всем тоже.

en: No, why do you keep arguing with me? You just need them.
ru: Почему вы продолжаете спорить со мной?

en: You're gonna get frostbite! - I don't even know.
ru: - Ты замерзнешь! - Я даже не знаю.

en: Yeah. Hey!
La Push, baby. You in? - Should I know what that means?
ru: - Ла Пуш, детка. Ты за? - И что это значит?

en: La Push Beach down at the Quileute Rez. We're all going tomorrow.
ru: Ла Пуш пляж в резервации квилетов. Мы все едем завтра.

en: Yeah, there's a big swell coming in. - And I don't just surf the Internet.
ru: - Ага, обещали шторм. - И я не просто покоряю интернет.

en: Eric, you stood up once, and it was a foam board.
ru: Эрик, ты встал однажды на доску и шлёпнулся.

en: But there's whale watching, too. Come with us.
La Push, baby. It's La Push.
ru: Ла Пуш, детка. Это Ла Пуш.

en: Okay, I'll go if you stop saying that, okay?
Seriously, dude. It's creepy, man.
What? That's what it's called. - So...
Edible art?
Bella.
Thanks.
You know, your mood swings are kind of giving me whiplash.
ru: Ты знаешь, на перемены в твоём настроении у меня аллергия.

en: I only said it'd be better if we weren't friends,
ru: Я всего лишь сказал, что нам нельзя дружить,

en: not that I didn't wanna be.
ru: а не то я не хочу.

en: What does that mean?
It means if you were smart, you'd stay away from me.
ru: Это значит, если ты такая умная, то держись от меня подальше.

en: Okay, well, let's say for argument's sake that I'm not smart.
ru: Ладно, допустим что я не умная.

en: Would you tell me the truth? - No, probably not.
ru: - Ты скажешь мне правду? - Нет, наверное нет.

en: I'd rather hear your theories.
I have considered
radioactive spiders and Kryptonite.
That's all superhero stuff, right?
What if I'm not the hero? What if I'm the bad guy?
ru: Что, если я не герой? Что, если я плохой парень?

en: You're not.
I can see what you're trying to put off,
but I can see that it's just to keep people away from you.
It's a mask.
Why don't we just hang out?
ru: Почему мы не можем просто встречаться?

en: Everybody's going to the beach.
Come.
I mean, have fun.
Which beach? - La Push.
I don't know.
I just...
Is there something wrong with that beach?
ru: И чем же плох этот пляж?

en: It's just a little crowded.
Hey, it's freezing. - I'm paddling out, Coates.
ru: - Эй. Ну и холодрыга. - Я погнал, котики.

en: I don't know if it's worth it anymore. - We drove all the way out here.
ru: - Я не знаю, стоит ли. - Мы все сюда пришли

en: I'm at least paddling out. - Yeah. She's right. - You guys are babies.
ru: - Она права. - Вы как дети малые.

en: So, I keep thinking that Eric's gonna ask me to the prom,
ru: Я всё надеюсь, что Эрик пригласит меня на бал,

en: and then he just doesn't.
You should ask him.
Take control. You're a strong, independent woman.
ru: Действуй. Ты сильная и независимая женщина.

en: I am? - Yes.
Hey, will you do me up? - Yeah.
Bella! - Hi, Jacob.
Guys, this is Jacob. - Hey, guys. How you doing?
ru: - Ребята, это Джейкоб. - Привет. Как дела?

en: Hi. - Hi.
What are you, like, stalking me?
You're on my rez, remember?
Are you surfing?
Definitely not. - Thanks.
You guys should keep Bella company. Her date bailed.
ru: Составь Бэлле компанию. Ее парень слинял.

en: What date?
She invited Edward.
To be polite, that's it. - I think it's nice she invited him.
ru: - Чтобы быть вежливой, вот и все. - Это хорошо что она пригласила его.

en: Nobody ever does. - Yeah, 'cause Cullen's a freak.
ru: - Его никто не зовет. - Да этот Каллен псих.

en: You got that right.
You guys know him?
The Cullens don't come here.
What did your friends mean about, you know, "The Cullens don't come here?"
ru: Что твои друзья имели в виду, ты знаешь, " Каллены сюда не приходят?"

en: You caught that, huh?
I'm not really supposed to say anything about it.
ru: Я не должен об этом распространятся.

en: Hey, I can keep a secret.
Really, it's just like an old scary story.
ru: Ха, брось, это просто старинная страшилка.

en: Well, I want to know.
Okay, did you know Quileutes are supposedly descended from wolves?
ru: Ладно. Ты знаешь что по легенде Квилеты потомки волков?

en: What? Like, wolves?
Yeah. - Like, real wolves?
Well, that's the legend of our tribe.
Okay.
So what's the story about the Cullens?
Well, they're supposedly descended from this, like, enemy clan.
ru: По этой легенде они потомки враждебного клана.

en: My great grandfather, the chief, found them hunting on our land.
ru: Мой прапрадед, вождь, увидел как они охотятся на нашей земле.

en: But they claimed to be something different,
ru: Но они заявили, что они другие,

en: so we made a treaty with them.
ru: и мы заключили с ними договор.

en: If they promised to stay off Quileute lands,
ru: Они обещали не соваться на нашу землю,

en: then we wouldn't expose what they really were to the palefaces.
ru: а мы поклялись не рассказывать кто они, бледнолицым.

en: I thought they just moved here.
Or just moved back.
Right.
It touched my hand. A snake! Stop!
ru: Это коснулось моей руки. Змея! Остановитесь!

en: Well, what are they really?
ru: И кто они на самом деле?

en: It's just a story, Bella.
Come on, let's go.
A snake! A snake!
My mama said I didn't know how to make a kitty meow
ru: Моя мама сказала, что не знает почему мяукает кошка

en: Hello?
Gerald?
Gerald?
Hello.
Nice jacket.
Who are you?
It's always the same inane questions.
"Who are you?"
"What do you want?"
"Why are you doing this?"
James, let's not play with our food.
He's not here.
Whenever the weather's nice, the Cullens disappear.
What, do they just ditch?
No, Dr. and Mrs. Cullen yank them out for, like, hiking and camping and stuff.
ru: Нет, доктор Каллен с женой устраивают походы, пикники.

en: I tried that out on my parents. Not even close.
ru: Я пыталась вытащить предков. Ничего не вышло.

en: Guys, I'm going to the prom with Eric.
ru: Девочки! Я иду на бал с Эриком.

en: I just asked him. I took control. - I told you that would happen.
ru: - Я его позвала. Я решилась. - Я же говорила.

en: Are you sure you have to go out of town?
Oh, yeah, it's a little family thing.
Okay, we should go shopping in Port Angeles
before all the good dresses get cleaned out.
Port Angeles? You mind if I come?
Yeah, I need your opinion.
I like this one. - That's cool.
But, like, I don't know about the one-shoulder thing.
I like this one. - Yeah, I like the beading,
ru: - А если вот это. - Да, мне нравится,

en: and you wouldn't need jewelry. - Jess, what do you think? Lavender?
ru: но бусы не нужны. - Джесс, что скажешь? Лавандовое?

en: Is that good? Is that my color? - I like it.
ru: - Мой цвет? Кажется, оно хорошее? - Мне нравится.

en: I liked that dusty rose one, too.
Okay, I like this one. It makes my boobs look good.
ru: Всё, я выбрала. Грудь классно смотрится.

en: Hey. - Right?
Nice.
Oh, God. - That is uncomfortable.
That's disgusting.
Bella, what do you think?
Yes?
That looks great.
You said that about, like, the last five dresses, though.
ru: Ты сказала так обо всех платьях.

en: I thought they were all pretty good.
You're not really into this, are you?
I actually really just want to go to this bookstore.
ru: Я просто хочу в книжный магазин.

en: I'll meet you guys at the restaurant?
Are you sure? - Yeah, yeah. I'll see you in a minute.
ru: - Ты уверена? - Да, да, я подожду.

en: Okay. - Okay.
She's right, though. This looks awesome.
There you go.
Have a good night. - Thank you.
Saw you in the dress store. - Hey, where you running to?
ru: - Я видел тебя в бутике. - Эй, куда побежала?

en: There she is.
What's up? - It's my girl.
ru: - В чем дело? - Это моя подружка.

en: How you guys doing? - Look who we just found.
ru: - Что вы делаете? - Смотри что мы нашли.

en: What's up, girl? Hey... Where you going?
ru: В чем дело, девочка? Эй... Ты куда?

en: Where are you going? - Come get a drink with us.
ru: - Куда уходите? - Пойдем выпьем с нами.

en: Yeah, you should hang out with us. - Come on.
ru: - Вы должны повисеть с нами. - Давайте.

en: It's fun.
What's the problem? - She doesn't like that, man.
ru: - В чем проблема? - Ей не нравятся мы.

en: You're pretty. - Don't touch me.
Cute. - Really, no. Seriously, you should.
Don't touch me.
Get in the car.
That was a very dangerous maneuver.
I should go back there and rip those guys' heads off.
ru: Надо бы вернуться и головы им поотрывать.

en: No, you shouldn't.
You don't know the vile, repulsive things they were thinking.
ru: Ты не знаешь о каких гнусностях они думали.

en: And you do?
It's not hard to guess.
Can you talk about something else? Distract me so I won't turn around.
ru: О другом можешь поговорить? Отвлеки меня, чтобы я не вернулся.

en: You should put your seatbelt on.
You should put your seatbelt on.
I thought the salad was pretty good. - Hey, you guys, I'm sorry. I just...
ru: - Я думаю что салаты отличная еда. - Эй, девочки! Извините, я просто...

en: Where were you? We left you messages.
ru: Где ты была, мы тебя заждались.

en: Yeah, we waited, but we were, like, starving, so we...
ru: Мы ждали, но так проголодались, что...

en: I'm sorry I kept Bella from dinner.
ru: Извините, это я задержал Бэллу на ужин.

en: We just sort of ran into each other and got talking.
Yeah. - No.
No, we totally understand. I mean, that happens, right?
ru: Нееет, всё понятно, конечно... Бывает, верно?

en: Yeah, we were...
We were, yeah, we were just leaving. So... - Let's get this...
Bella, if you wanna...
I think I should make sure Bella gets something to eat.
ru: Я думаю мой долг накормить Бэллу.

en: If you'd like.
I'll drive you home myself.
That's so thoughtful.
It's really thoughtful. Yeah.
Yeah. I should eat something.
Yeah. Okay, so we'll see you tomorrow. - Okay, yeah.
See ya. - Okay.
All right, one mushroom ravioli.
Thanks. - Yeah, no problem.
So are you sure there isn't anything I can get for you?
ru: А Вам точно ничего не нужно?

en: No. No, thank you.
Let me know.
You're really not gonna eat?
No, I'm on a special diet.
You gotta give me some answers.
Yes, no.
To get to the other side.
I don't want to know what the square root of pi is.
ru: Я не о квадратном корне из числа Пи.

en: You knew that?
How did you know where I was?
I didn't.
All right. - What?
Don't leave. I...
Did you follow me?
I feel very protective of you.
ru: Я хочу всегда заботиться о тебе.

en: So you followed me.
I was trying to keep a distance unless you needed my help,
ru: Я старался держаться на расстоянии, пока не понадобится моя помощь,

en: and then I heard what those low-lifes were thinking.
ru: и когда я услышал о чём думают эти подонки.

en: Wait.
You say you heard what they were thinking?
ru: Ты услышал о чём они думают?

en: So what, you...
You read minds?
I can read every mind in this room.
ru: Я могу прочесть мысли любого в этом зале.

en: Apart from yours.
There's money, sex,
money,
sex,
cat.
And then you, nothing.
It's very frustrating.
Is there something wrong with me?
ru: Так со мной что-то не так?

en: See, I tell you I can read minds,
ru: Я всего лишь сказал, что читаю мысли,

en: and you think there's something wrong with you.
ru: а ты начала копаться в себе.

en: What is it?
I don't have the strength to stay away from you anymore.
ru: У меня нет сил оторваться от тебя.

en: Then don't.
Okay, I think I'm warm enough now.
Your hand is so cold.
Whoa! What is going on?
My dad's still here.
Can you pull in?
That's my father's car on the end.
What is he doing here?
Carlisle, what's going on?
Waylon Forge was found in a boat out near his place.
ru: Вэйлона Форджа нашли в лодке у причала.

en: I just examined the body. - He died?
How? - Animal attack.
Was it the same one that got that security guard down in Mason?
ru: Тот же что на охранника в Мэйсоне?

en: Most likely.
Well, it's getting closer to town, then. - Bella, you should go inside.
ru: - Ну, он приближается к городу. - Бэлла, пойди в участок.

en: Waylon was your father's friend.
Okay.
I'll see you later.
Hey. - Hey.
Dad, I'm really sorry.
I've known him going on 30 years.
Don't worry, we're gonna find this thing.
ru: Не переживай, мы найдем эту тварь.

en: Meantime,
I want you to carry this with you.
ru: Я хочу чтобы ты носила это с собой.

en: I don't know if you... - It'll give your old man some peace of mind.
ru: - Я не знаю... - И старику будет спокойно.

en: Okay.
Let's go home.
Cold One.
You're impossibly fast and strong.
Your skin is pale white and ice-cold.
Your eyes change color.
And sometimes you speak like you're from a different time.
ru: И иногда ты говоришь как будто ты из другого времени.

en: You never eat or drink anything. You don't go out in the sunlight.
ru: Ты никогда ничего не ешь и не пьёшь. Ты избегаешь солнца.

en: How old are you?
Seventeen.
How long have you been 17?
A while.
I know what you are.
Say it.
Out loud.
Say it.
Vampire.
Are you afraid?
No.
Then ask me the most basic question.
What do we eat?
You won't hurt me.
Where are we going?
Up the mountain.
Out of the cloud bank.
You need to see what I look like in the sunlight.
ru: Ты увидишь какой я при свете солнца.

en: This is why we don't show ourselves in sunlight.
People would know we're different.
ru: Люди мы поняли, что мы другие.

en: This is what I am.
It's like diamonds.
You're beautiful.
Beautiful?
This is the skin of a killer, Bella.
I'm a killer.
I don't believe that.
That's because you believe the lie.
ru: Потому что ты веришь в ложь.

en: It's camouflage.
I'm the world's most dangerous predator.
ru: Я самый опасный хищник в мире.

en: Everything about me invites you in,
ru: Всё, что есть во мне - притягивает тебя,

en: my voice, my face, even my smell.
ru: мой голос, моё лицо, даже мой запах.

en: As if I would need any of that.
As if you could outrun me!
As if you could fight me off.
I'm designed to kill.
I don't care.
I've killed people before.
It does not matter.
I wanted to kill you.
I've never wanted a human's blood so much in my life.
ru: Я никогда не испытывал такой жажды человеческой крови.

en: I trust you.
Don't.
I'm here. I trust you.
My family, we're different from others of our kind.
ru: Моя семья отличается от нас подобных.

en: We only hunt animals.
We've learned to control our thirst.
But it's you, your scent,
it's like a drug to me.
You're like my own personal brand of heroin.
Why did you hate me so much when we met?
ru: Ты же ненавидел меня с того момента, когда встретились?

en: I did.
Only for making me want you so badly.
ru: Но лишь потому, что страстно желал.

en: I still don't know if I can control myself.
ru: И я не знаю смогу ли я сдержаться.

en: I know you can.
I can't read your mind.
ru: Я не могу читать твои мысли.

en: You have to tell me what you're thinking.
Now I'm afraid.
Good.
I'm not afraid of you.
I'm only afraid of losing you. I feel like you're gonna disappear.
ru: Я только боюсь тебя потерять. Что ты вдруг исчезнешь.

en: You don't know how long I've waited for you.
ru: Ты не знаешь как я долго ждал тебя.

en: So the lion fell in love with the lamb.
What a stupid lamb.
What a sick, masochistic lion.
About three things I was absolutely positive.
ru: В трёх вещах я была абсолютно уверена.

en: First,
Edward was a vampire.
Second,
there was a part of him,
and I didn't know how dominant that part might be,
ru: и я не знала насколько эта часть сильна,

en: that thirsted for my blood.
And third,
I was unconditionally and irrevocably in love with him.
ru: я безоглядно и навсегда влюбилась в него.

en: Monte Carlo? That's our prom theme?
Gambling, tuxedos, and Bond, James Bond.
ru: Азартные игры, смокинги, и Бонд, Джеймс Бонд.

en: Oh, my God.
Wow. You know, everybody's staring.
Not that guy. No, he just looked.
ru: Только не этот парень. Нет, он просто глянул.

en: I'm breaking all the rules now anyway.
ru: Раз уж мы нарушаем все правила.

en: Since I'm going to hell.
So, does a person have to be dying
to become like you?
No, that's just Carlisle.
He'd never do this to someone who had another choice.
ru: Он бы не поступил так с тем, у кого есть выбор.

en: So, how long have you been like this?
Since 1918.
That's when Carlisle found me dying of Spanish influenza.
ru: Карлайл нашёл меня, когда я умирал от гриппа испанки.

en: What was it like?
The venom was excruciating.
But what Carlisle did was much harder.
Not many of us have the restraint to do that.
ru: Немногие из нас смогли бы удержаться.

en: But didn't he just have to bite?
Not exactly.
When we taste
human blood, a sort of frenzy begins,
ru: человеческую кровь, начинается что-то вроде безумия,

en: and it's almost impossible to stop.
But Carlisle did.
First with me and then with his wife, Esme.
ru: Сначала со мной, а потом со своей женой, Эсме.

en: So is Carlisle the real reason that you don't kill people?
ru: Значит только из-за Карлайла ты не убиваешь людей?

en: No, he's not the only reason.
I don't want to be a monster.
My family, we think of ourselves as vegetarians, right,
ru: Моя семья, мы думаем как вегетарианцы,

en: 'cause we only survive on the blood of animals.
ru: позволяем себе пить только кровь животных.

en: But it's...
It's like a human only living on tofu.
ru: Это все равно как если бы человек ел только тофу.

en: It keeps you strong, but you're never fully satisfied.
ru: Силы даёт, но нет чувства насыщения.

en: It wouldn't be like drinking your blood, for instance.
ru: Другое дело выпить твоей крови к примеру.

en: Was it other vampires that killed Waylon?
Yeah. There are others out there, and we run into them from time to time.
ru: Есть и другие, и мы иногда их встречаем.

en: Can the rest of your family read people's minds like you can?
ru: В твоей семье все умеют читать мысли как ты?

en: No. That's just me.
But Alice can see the future.
I bet she saw me coming.
Alice's visions are subjective.
I mean, the future can always change.
Could you act human? I mean, I've got neighbors.
ru: А нельзя по-человечески? У меня же соседи.

en: I'm gonna take you to my place tomorrow.
ru: Завтра я отвезу тебя к себе.

en: Thanks.
Wait, like, with your family? - Yeah.
What if they don't like me?
So, you're worried not because you'll be in a house full of vampires,
ru: Ты боишься. Не логова жутких вампиров,

en: but because you think they won't approve of you?
I'm glad I amuse you.
